Let's use the Lahman database. First let's download some packages:
```{r}
library(Lahman)
library(dplyr)
```

##Code
Now let's run some codes:

```{r}
Batting%>%
  select(playerID,teamID,yearID,HR)%>%
  filter(HR>50)
```
